item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, February 19, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. US and Russia agree to ‘lay the groundwork’ for ending Ukraine war
2. Trump signals Ukraine should hold elections as part of Russia peace talks
3. [Opinion] Elon Musk’s wrecking ball
4. US-Russia talks spark European fears of Ukraine settlement on Putin’s terms
5. Former OpenAI technology chief Mira Murati launches rival start-up
item.guid: FT Most Read: Wednesday, February 19, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
